attributes.action: stop giving priority to asylum seeker for council homes over our own homeless".
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
the governments policy according to wakefield council is they have to give priority to asylum seekers for council houses and flats, 
what about our own homeless, who have had their names down for years and have been told they dont stand a chance of getting accomodation while ever asylum seekers need homes.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "stop giving priority to asylum seeker for council homes over our own homeless".

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page13794.asp

Prime Minister's Office
